Hello together,
I want to announce our newest offers.
We are offering cheap KVM-virtualized vServers hosted in Germany at the main exchange Point in Frankfurt.

Prices start at 1€ per month.
This are our recent plans:

---

vStarter 128

128MB RAM

1x 1.0GHz

50GB HDD

1€ per month

---

vStarter 256

256MB RAM

1x 1.3GHz

75GB HDD

2€ per month

---

vStarter 512

512MB RAM

1x 1.5GHz

100GB HDD

4€ per month

---

There are also more expensive plans available!

All packages include 500GB bandwith. After 500GB you have to pay 0.02€ per GB.

---

You can order one of them here:
https://comstownit.de/servers

Currently there are only some parts of the website in english. We are sorry for that.

To order a server, you have to register an account here: https://comstownit.de/login.php?ref=/cp

If you are logged in please make sure your prepaid balance is high enough to order. Otherwise you can charge here: https://comstownit.de/cp/prepaids.php

We currently accept:

- PayPal

- paysafecard

- Call2Pay (only germany)

- direct debit

- bank transfer

- online banking


As far as your prepaid Balance is high enough you can add the server to the shopping basket by clicking on ">> Warenkorb" and then order it by clicking on "kostenpflichtig Bestellen".

After about 5-10 minutes you will receive a mail that you server is activated.

Please note: There is no OS installed. You have to choose an ISO from the list "Boot-Einstellungen". You will have to set a KVM password at "KVM Console". As soon as it is set, you can use the Java-Console by clicking on the button "KVM Console" or you can just use any VNC Client to connect to the address listed over the password-field.
If you want us to install the server for you, you can answer to the mail with which OS you need.

Supported OS are:

- Windows Server 2012 64Bit

- Windows Server 2008 R2 64Bit

- Windows Server 2008 64Bit

- Windows Server 2003 64Bit

- gParted LiveCD

- Debian 7 64Bit

- Debian 7.2 32Bit

- Debian 6 64Bit

- CentOS 5.9

- CentOS 6.4

- Ubuntu 12.04 LTS

- Ubuntu 13.04

- FreeBSD 9.1

- FreeBSD 9.2

- Finnix LiveCD

- Slitaz LiveCD

- Android 4.3

- Android 4.2

Please note: Windows Server and CentOS* will only work on machines with 512MB or more RAM.

*= The CentOS installer hangs up if less than 512MB RAM is available. The system itself is able to run. You can always contact us and ask for more RAM for the installation process.

If you have any questions, this is how you can contact us:
E-Mail: support@comstown-it.de
LiveChat: Either a supporter is online or you can send us a message
Telephone: +49 381 806 991 88
